version_description:
Friday, July 26, 2019, Rainy

What's new with inFace:

We optimized the English version and English copy for inFace, and the friends who are used to English can use inFace better!
Also fixed some bugs~

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments! Thanks a lot!

Friday, August 2, 2019, Cloudy

inFace updated:

[ New Function ] Wonderful Brush! Don't be new! Come on and make your photos more wonderful with fantastic brushes!
[ New Tutorial ] We have added some new tutorials for inFace, inFace getting better!
[ New Effect ] We have optimized some dynamic effects, cool inFace!

Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 and 红领巾, the Designers: LINYI, doudouliang and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, August 23, 2019, Sunny

What's new with inFace:

Wonderful brushes material have become more and more! The materials are also more beautiful! Come and pick up your wonderful brush to make your photos more interesting!
Add the Japanese and Spanish versions, inFace has become more international!
Joined the "Face-lift" feature, just in the "Shaping"! Make your face more delicate!
Optimized some visual effects, hope you like it~


Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, August 30, 2019, Sunny

What's new with inFace:

Updated some tutorials, hope you will like ~
Also fixed some bugs, giving you a better experience~


Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, September 13, 2019, Rainy

What's new with inFace:

New! Photo color mixing function! Change colors, photos more sense of story!
New! HSL color function! More color for you!


Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, September 20, 2019, Cloudy

What's new with inFace:

Fixed bugs, we hope your experience better!

Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, September 26, 2019, Sunny

What's new with inFace:

New function! Separate tones! Change color, photos more exciting~
Creativity! Add custom presets to your photo palette! More than one color! To create your own presets!
Improved! Vignetting! More freedom of vignetting! You will love it!

Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 , 小海and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang , Melting, Fish and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, October 11, 2019, Sunny

What's new with inFace:

We made a little optimization on Edit, let's try it!

Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 、小海and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang 、Melting、Fish and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Saturday, November 2, 2019, Sunny

What's new with inFace:

[New Features] Fun stickers! Make your photos more interesting!
[New Features] Featured Texture! One-click photo atmosphere!
[New Features] Optional colors! Change the local color of the photo and find it in the photo palette!

Thanks to the Programmers: Lily, Kester, Bob, Wall·E, Frank, 龙兄 ,小海, lieon and 红领巾, and Designers: LINYI, doudouliang 、Melting、Fish and Carina.

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Tuesday, November 5, 2019, Rainy

inFace fixed bugs.

Recent updates:
[New Features] Fun stickers! Make your photos more interesting!
[New Features] Featured Texture! One-click photo atmosphere!
[New Features] Optional colors! Change the local color of the photo and find it in the photo palette!

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Thursday, November 14, 2019, Sunny

We made small optimization for [ Brush ].

Recent updates:
[New Features] Fun stickers! Make your photos more interesting!
[New Features] Featured Texture! One-click photo atmosphere!
[New Features] Optional colors! Change the local color of the photo and find it in the photo palette!

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Wednesday, December 4, 2019, Cloudy

[NEW FEATURE] Background! Use the ever-changing background for portrait cutout and background replacement, update 5 sets of materials every week, change a variety of styles, and change the background!
[NEW OPTIMIZATION] We have added a color display for the separation of colors. Check it out in the Edit!
[NEW EXTENSION] Stickers and Textures support more adjustments! Brightness, exposure, contrast, saturation ...
[NEW ICON] New year is coming, we have changed the new icon for inFace, hope you will like it!

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Monday, January 6, 2020, Cloudy

Fixed a bug in [ Edit ].

[Recent Update] Background! Use the ever-changing background for portrait cutout and background replacement, update 5 sets of materials every week, change a variety of styles, and change the background!
[Recent Update] Stickers and Textures support more adjustments! Brightness, exposure, contrast, saturation ...

Happy new year! Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, January 10, 2020

New feature for selecting trial version
Add member-specific icons

[Recent update] Variety Background! Use the ever-changing background for portrait cutout and background replacement, update 5 sets of materials every week, and change various styles, just in the ever-changing background!
[Recent update] Fun stickers and selected textures support more adjustments! Brightness, exposure, contrast, saturation ...

I wish you all a Happy New Year! Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it, please give us a lot of comments ~
inFace fan welfare group: 588983000

Friday, January 17, 2020, Cloudy

Huh! Chinese new year is coming! Happy new year! inFace Studio wishes you a happy new year! All the best!

Let's see what's updated this time:
[NEW FEATURE] Blend if! inFace brings you new magic sky material! If you are not satisfied with the sky you photographed, go to the "Texture", find the category of sky, and change the sky! Change your mood!
[NEW FEATURE] The 3: 2 ratio tailoring. Now, in the "Crop" function, you can find it!
[New icon] We have replaced the Chinese New Year icon and Chinese New Year startup page! Hope you like them!

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Tuesday March 3, 2020, Cloudy

Let's see what's updated this time:

[NEW FEATURE] “Creative Effects” Impression oil painting, freehand watercolor, art prints, high-quality HDR, interested distortion effects ... How much creativity there be in the “Creative Effects”, just try it!
[NEW FEATURE] Whenever there has light, there will has shadows also. Find the “Add Shadow” function in the ever-changing background to see how shadows play!
[NEW OPTIMIZATION] We have attached a small love icon to the presets you have collected. Go to the photo color palette to see them!

Epidemic current, please wear a mask well, eat more vegetables and fruits, wash your hands, more ventilation, do not go to the place where there are many people, safeguard your and family health, work together to win the war "epidemic"!

Thank you for using inFace, we will continue to optimize and update it for everyone, please give us comments!

inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

Friday, March 13, 2020, Sunny
Hi everyone! Spring has come! Let's see what's updated this time:

[Update] Texture’s “Sky” material effects are all updated! All materials have new performance, go and try!
[Optimization] We optimized the small icon of "magenta" in "selectable colors"
[Optimization] We optimized the "Feedback and Help", so speak freely, we are always listening!

Thank you for using inFace. We will continue to update and optimize it for the ultimate photo editing experience.
inFace e-mail: inface@camera360.cn

2020年4月21日 星期二 多云

修复bug.

inFace 全新版本，这是我们的改变：

【新功能】自动修图，风格百变，超多超in的修图攻略等你来体验！
【新功能】消除笔！轻轻一擦，去掉冗余，让你的照片更完美！
【新优化】现在我们可以选择输出的照片画质啦！就在侧边栏！
【新优化】你的图片可以自由拖动和放置了！图片边界上无法涂抹的bug被我们消灭啦！
【新优化】inFace把你的照片的EXIF信息妥帖保管～
【新优化】照片调色悄悄地跑到了前排，现在它在消除笔的后面！
【新素材】我们更新了一批新的贴纸素材，点击一下就自动应用到面部！
【新界面】我们对编辑面板作了一些改动，现在它更加生动了！


感谢大家选择inFace，我们会持续更新、优化，只为极致修图体验。
inFace 交流QQ群：588983000

2020年4月28日 星期二 晴


【新功能】新增蒙版能力：自动人像保护、反向、填充，图片在你手中，去创造更多花样！
【新优化】更快速的自动修图！更多更好看的修图效果～
【新优化】自定义预设中无法输入文字的bug被我们消灭啦！
【新优化】局部精修中，淡化色彩更名为“减鲜艳度”，减轻光晕更名为“减轻过曝”。


近期更新：

【新功能】自动修图，风格百变，超多超in的修图攻略等你来体验！
【新功能】消除笔！轻轻一擦，去掉冗余，让你的照片更完美！
【新优化】现在我们可以选择输出的照片画质啦！就在侧边栏！
【新优化】你的图片可以自由拖动和放置了！图片边界上无法涂抹的bug被我们消灭啦！
【新优化】inFace把你的照片的EXIF信息妥帖保管～

感谢大家选择inFace，我们会持续更新、优化，只为极致修图体验。

这一次，我们重新定义“自动修图”，给你最新的，也是最好的。

【新首页】加点优雅，加点活力，再加入你的天生完美，这就是你的inFace！
【新功能】修图功能，智能推荐！专门为你的照片打造的修图攻略，点击一下就应用！
【新logo】我们的logo来了一个360度大转身！
【新优化】又修复了一些bug呦，使用起来更加稳定！



感谢大家选择inFace，我们会持续更新、优化，只为极致修图体验。

2020年7月30日 星期四 雨

8月走近了，而我们也带来了一些新东西，相信你会喜欢～

【新技术】3D技术革新，全新五官微调，让五官更立体，更精致！
【新功能】小头、瞳间距、嘴巴高度、鼻子大小，在五官微调里找到这些新功能！
【新优化】修复了极致肤质内，使用五官立体时会出现小方块的bug，捉虫！
【新优化】在极致肤质、手动塑形、五官微调里增加了一些视频介绍，来看看吧～


感谢大家选择inFace，我们会持续更新、优化，只为极致修图体验。
